attributes.action: create a healthy eating tax credit.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Each product could have a healty eating rating assigned by an independent body.
When you go and do your shop and take health into concern you clock up points which are on the bottom alongside a code of the recipt. Then when you want to claim your extra money in the new tax year you can. This is decided by income status and how well you done.
This would help a lot of health issues and could be designed as to even save the government money due to the extra workforce and lower nhs health costs.
It would also encourage some parents to stop buying their kids junk food.
Of course this idea would have to include an ethical standard of including local producers and retailers along side the big guys.
